q: If you do not get the chills when you set your goal you're not setting big enough goals.
h:
“If you do not get the chills when you set your goal you're not setting big enough goals.” —
Bob Proctor

q: Every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future.
h:
“Every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future.” —
Oscar Wilde

q: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
h:
“If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.” —
Isaac Newton

q: Lost Time is never found again.
h:
“Lost Time is never found again.” —
Benjamin Franklin

q: I think self-awareness is probably the most important thing towards being a champion.
h:
“I think self-awareness is probably the most important thing towards being a champion. ” —
Billie Jean King

q: The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
h:
“The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.” —
Bette Midler

q: Just because you are happy it does not mean that the day is perfect but that you have looked beyond its imperfections.
h:
“Just because you are happy it does not mean that the day is perfect but that you have looked beyond its imperfections.” —
Bob Marley

q: He who leaves the game wins it.
h:
“He who leaves the game wins it.” —
Nicolas Chamfort

q: The quieter you become, the more you are able to hear.
h:
“The quieter you become, the more you are able to hear.” —
Rumi

q: Teachers open the door. You enter by yourself.
h:
“Teachers open the door. You enter by yourself. ” —
Chinese Proverb

q: When you know what you want, and want it bad enough, you will find a way to get it.
h:
“When you know what you want, and want it bad enough, you will find a way to get it.” —
Jim Rohn

q: If life is a video game, the graphics are great, but the plot is confusing and the tutorial is way too long.
h:
“If life is a video game, the graphics are great, but the plot is confusing and the tutorial is way too long.” —
Elon Musk

q: Elegance does not consist in putting on a new dress.
h:
“Elegance does not consist in putting on a new dress.” —
Coco Chanel

q: You live by what you thrill to, and there's the end of it.
h:
“You live by what you thrill to, and there's the end of it.” —
D. H. Lawrence
